title: NewsBreak: U.S. Payrolls Rise 130,000 in August; Jobless Rate Stays at 3.7%
text:
NewsBreak: U.S. Payrolls Rise 130,000 in August; Jobless Rate Stays at 3.7%

Economic Indicators 13 hours ago (Sep 06, 2019 08:46AM ET)

© Reuters. Investing - Nonfarm payrolls 130,000 in August, the Labor Department reported Friday, less than expected. The market was expecting to have risen 160,000 last month, according to economists’ forecasts compiled by Investing.com. The remained steady at 3.7%. Stock index futures climbed after the report, with up about 0.5%. rose 0.4% monthly and 3.2% from the . That compared with expectations for an August increase of 0.3% and a 3.1% year-over-year rise.

NewsBreak: U.S. Payrolls Rise 130,000 in August; Jobless Rate Stays at 3.7%
